name: Noto Rashi Hebrew
description: Noto is a global font collection for writing in all modern and ancient languages. Noto Rashi Hebrew is modulated (“serif”) design for the Middle Eastern Hebrew script with a semi-cursive skeleton based on 15th-century Sephardic writing. It can be used for emphasis, complementing Noto Serif Hebrew. Similar designs were used for religious commentary. It has multiple weights and 92 glyphs.
author: Google
